title: Honor 3
body: Hello guys! I have just reached honor 3 today, shouldnt there be a loading screen something, or its just if i keep it until the next season as the ranks? Thanks for the help!

replies.body: You'll have the loading screen flair for the next match when you get honored by 2 premade teammates or honored by 1 person who wasn't in your premade! The flair only lasts for one match, but you can absolutely keep earning in game after game.
try not to give out wrong information. if you arent sure about something, search the boards but dont pass on wrong info
ive seen honor flairs in game and hes honor 3
